SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NICKNAME,
CASE WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_DT < 1/24/60 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - BOARD_DT) * 24 * 60 * 60 ) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_DT < 1/24 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - BOARD_DT) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_DT < 1 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - BOARD_DT) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(BOARD_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END BOARD_DT,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "REPLY" C WHERE C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) REPLY_COUNT,
(SELECT BOARD_IMG_PATH || BOARD_IMG_RENAME FROM BOARD_IMAGE I WHERE I.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO AND BOARD_IMG_ORDER = 0) THUMBNAIL FROM "BOARD" B JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_ST = 'N' AND BOARD_CD = ${boardCode} ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD
JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO)
WHERE BOARD_CD = ${boardCode} AND BOARD_ST ='N'
AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%${query}%'
AND BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%${query}%'
AND (BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%${query}%' OR BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%${query}%')
AND MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE '%${query}%'

(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY C WHERE C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) REPLY_COUNT,
(SELECT BOARD_IMG_PATH || BOARD_IMG_RENAME FROM BOARD_IMAGE I WHERE I.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO AND BOARD_IMG_ORDER = 0) THUMBNAIL FROM "BOARD" B JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_ST = 'N' AND BOARD_CD = ${boardCode}
AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%${query}%'
AND BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%${query}%'
AND (BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%${query}%' OR BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%${query}%')
AND MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE '%${query}%'
ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
